MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2 - A3: Subject Family History

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

MOMYOD.Description: Mother - year of death (Blank if MOMLIV ≠ 0)

MOMDEM.Description: Does/did subject's mother have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

MOMONSET.Description: Mother - age of onset (Blank if MOMDEM ≠ 1)

DADYOD.Description: Father - year of death (Blank if DADLIV ≠ 0)

DADDEM.Description: Does/did subject's father have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

DADONSET.Description: Father - age of onset (Blank if DADDEM ≠ 1)

TWINTYPE.Description: If the subject is a twin, indicate type (Blank if TWIN ≠ 1)

SIB{d}YOD.Description: Sibling {d} - year of death (Blank if SIB{d}LIV ≠ 0)

SIB{d}DEM.Description: Does/did Sibling {d} have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

SIB{d}ONS.Description: Sibling {d} - age of onset (Blank if SIB{d}MEM ≠ 1)

KID{d}YOD.Description: Child {d} - year of death (Blank if SIB{d}LIV ≠ 0)

KID{d}DEM.Description: Does/did Child {d} have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

KID{d}ONS.Description: Child {d} - age of onset (Blank if SIB{d}MEM ≠ 1)

RELSDEM.Description: Number of other demented (as defined on form) blood relatives (cousins, aunts, uncles, grandparents, half siblings), as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis.

REL{d}YOD.Description: Relative {d} - year of death (Blank if SIB{d}LIV ≠ 0)

REL{d}DEM.Description: Does/did Relative {d} have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

REL{d}ONS.Description: Relative {d} - age of onset (Blank if SIB{d}MEM ≠ 1)
